TopicTitle: Add the ability to EVA from internal view by double-clicking (or right-clicking) on hatches.

Articles.Content:
Just a simple, silly little thing that I think would add a lot to the game, in terms of user experience.

I enjoy the challenge of doing missions entirely from cockpit view, and going "outside" to do EVAs breaks the immersion (and I feel like I'm cheating when I glance at the altimeter).  Plus, it'd be something else to interact with.

I'd enjoy a hotkey for EVA of focused IVA Kerbal.

Edited May 27, 2018 by The Aziz
Clicking on a hatch to exit is implemented in RPM. But I would really appreciate a hotkey for going EVA as well.

I thought you could do it from the inside. I have only done it once. I was experimenting with a jet and as I was cruising around I clicked on the red handle (wondering what would happen) and I get ejected.
Hmm. If this is a thing, stock or rpm, I did not know about it. Now I gotta look.
